title: NHS diabetes prevention scheme helps one million people
description: Nearly one million people in England have started a specialist NHS scheme which can prevent or delay the onset of Type 2 diabetes, according to new analysis. The NHS’s Healthier You Programme is a clinically proven weight management and lifestyle change initiative, and was one of the world’s first diabetes prevention schemes when it was launched in 2016. title: Record numbers using NHS App to manage health
description: Record numbers of people are using the NHS App to manage their health, according to the latest statistics. The NHS has released a Spotify Wrapped-style end-of-year update which shows the NHS App now has more than 39 million registered users. title: Public urged to use NHS as normal over weekend of strike action
description: The NHS is reminding the public to continue coming forward for care as normal over the last 2 days of strike action this weekend. title: Hospitals on high alert amid strikes and winter viruses
description: Hospitals in England are “on high alert” this week, amid industrial action and a continuing stream of winter viruses.
